text:
Great seeing @CapsPup on the Hill spreading awareness for a bill that will connect more vets and first responders with highly-trained service animals.

It was an easy YES to sign onto the bill ‚Äì especially after meeting Biscuit. https://t.co/vSxHhFChX8

Conservative SCOTUS justices have ruled that it was okay for Ted Cruz to make campaign donors re-pay his personal debts. 

This is a dangerous precedent that encourages corruption. It‚Äôs bad for average voters and it‚Äôs bad for the future of our democracy. https://t.co/FpYnIpp1ai

NEW: We can't allow pro-Russian disinformation to keep poisoning the well on Facebook.

We recently learned of the harm this disinformation is causing  in countries like Slovakia & we're pushing Mark Zuckerberg (@MetaNewsroom) to crack down on Kremlin propaganda on Facebook. ‚¨áÔ∏è https://t.co/15ujcleuwW

Congratulations to Josiah Dunkin (@WeAreEaglecrest) & Rebecca Mobley (Northeast Early College), the 2nd & 3rd place winners of my #CongressionalArtChallenge.

So impressive to see the up-and-coming talent in our community. Excited to see what you achieve next! https://t.co/xbcDTSVDhL

When our servicemembers serve & sacrifice, their families do too.

I was grateful to hear directly from these Coloradans about how my Military Spouses Retirement Act will help them plan a stable retirement despite upheaval in their lives & jobs because of their spouses‚Äô service. https://t.co/1lX7Io5U5W

Always love seeing Coloradans when I‚Äôm in DC! Had a great visit with @JeffcoSchoolsCo‚Äôs Red Rocks Raccoons at the Capitol. We talked about what it‚Äôs like representing our community as a Member of Congress. #GoRacoons! https://t.co/qYCseyRjnG

Our firefighters are on the front lines protecting Colorado families as they battle the wildfires that have devastated our communities.

Proud to work with friends like @RepKatiePorter & @RepJoeNeguse to ensure our firefighters get the pay and benefits they deserve. https://t.co/nvHLIVeeo6

I was deeply impacted by the personal story Stacey shared with me recently about how @AumhcAurora's support changed her life.

I‚Äôm proud to have delivered $1M in funding for the Aurora Mental Health Center to keep changing & improving the lives of more folks in our community. https://t.co/PL7V7YVPWh

Our government should work for the people it represents ‚Äì not for corporate interests or for the personal benefit of elected officials.

I‚Äôm proud to receive an A+ from @StopBigMoney for my efforts to @EndCorruption & restore trust in government. https://t.co/xW3syBhmtN

Glad to see @SenatorHick & @SenatorBennet join my & @RepDLamborn‚Äôs bill to create the Space National Guard.

Colorado leads the country in guardsmen conducting space missions. Creating a @NationalGuard for @SpaceForceDoD will help prepare our forces so they remain mission-ready. https://t.co/p4MYVizpnD

The top 5 oil companies have made record profits this year, but instead of using profits to lower costs, Big Oil is enriching shareholders with $61 billion in stock buybacks & dividends.

Enough. We must hold Big Oil accountable so they stop price-gouging our hardworking families

Heartbreaking news from Buffalo, NY as another community experiences the tragedy of gun violence. 

As an American I stand with Buffalo as it mourns. 

As a lawmaker I‚Äôll never stop working to end these shootings and the spread of hate. 

It doesn‚Äôt have to be this way.

Great meeting with @POTUS in the Situation Room with @SpeakerPelosi & members of our delegation this week to discuss our recent travels to Ukraine.

Together, @HouseDemocrats and the Biden Administration are delivering the support Ukraine needs to fight and win this war. https://t.co/g9WgRLBgKT

As a dad, I understand how much stress this shortage is putting on Colorado parents.

We have to find solutions to address this crisis so parents have safe and reliable formula for their babies.
https://t.co/RmL0kDZ1jG

NEW: My Small Business Workforce Pipeline Act passed out of @HouseSmallBiz Committee this week!

It will help the small businesses that power our local economy provide on-the-job training to relieve the labor shortage.

I look forward to voting for it soon on the House floor! https://t.co/ZxGHMyxZSj

Congratulations to the winner of my Congressional Art Competition, Emily Zhang from @ccsdk12)!

Her piece, ‚ÄúSplit‚Äù will hang in the United States Capitol building. Be sure to stop by & see it if you make a trip to DC this summer. https://t.co/H0TjsGiNtK

üíØ @RepKatiePorter. I grew up in a working class family. I worked the fryer at @Arbys for min. wage.

This is reality for average American families.

I‚Äôm working hard to lower costs, ease supply chain issues, & increase energy independence to help working class families like mine https://t.co/6ATev57p56

As a combat veteran, I‚Äôve seen the toll trauma takes on the mental health of many of my fellow veterans.

This #MentalHealthAwarenessMonth, I‚Äôm wearing green to #StopTheStigma.

Normalize discussing mental health‚Äîyou never know the difference you could make for someone else. https://t.co/lIVpgtZB6F
